summary: Phase 3 Enhanced Chart Studio and AI Copilot Testing Complete - Iteration 18. All features verified working. Chart Studio shows 7 chart types (Bar, Horizontal Bar, Pie, Donut, Line, Area, Scatter), color palette selector, PNG download, and display options (Show Legend, Grid, Values). Enhanced AI Copilot shows conversation interface with auto-execute toggle, suggested queries panel with 4 categories (Descriptive, Comparison, Relationship, Trends), and data context information.

issues: Form selector appears empty/unselected in screenshots after form selection - may be a visual state issue but data loads correctly

critical_code_review_comments: ChartStudio.jsx correctly implements 7 chart types using Recharts library
ChartStudio.jsx has proper color palette selector with 6 palettes (default, pastel, dark, monochrome, warm, cool)
ChartStudio.jsx implements PNG download via canvas conversion from SVG
ChartStudio.jsx shows Data Summary table when chart data is loaded
EnhancedAICopilot.jsx correctly implements auto-execute toggle with Switch component
EnhancedAICopilot.jsx has 4 query categories: Descriptive, Comparison, Relationship, Trends
EnhancedAICopilot.jsx shows Data Context with Form ID, Variables count, Numeric/Categorical breakdown
EnhancedAICopilot.jsx maintains conversation history in local state
seed_data_creation: Using existing test data from iteration 16/17
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 3 Enhanced Chart Studio and AI Copilot features fully tested. User must switch to 'Test Organization' to see forms. MobilePayment form has 50 submissions with age, gender, satisfaction fields. Chart Studio works with variable selection. AI Copilot API works through /api/ai-copilot/analyze endpoint.

chart_studio.chart_type_selector: PASS - 7 types visible: Bar Chart, Horizontal Bar, Pie Chart, Donut Chart, Line Chart, Area Chart, Scatter Plot
chart_studio.color_palette_selector: PASS - 6 palettes available (default, pastel, dark, monochrome, warm, cool)
chart_studio.png_download: PASS - PNG button visible in Chart Preview header
chart_studio.data_summary_table: PASS - Appears when chart data is loaded (conditional rendering)
chart_studio.chart_preview: PASS - Shows 'Select a variable to create a chart' placeholder
chart_studio.chart_settings_panel: PASS - Left panel with Chart Type, Primary Variable, Chart Title, Subtitle
chart_studio.display_options: PASS - Show Legend, Show Grid, Show Values checkboxes present

enhanced_ai_copilot.conversation_interface: PASS - Shows 'Ask me anything about your data' with input area

query_categories.descriptive: PASS - 3 queries about summary statistics, frequencies, distribution
query_categories.comparison: PASS - 3 queries about comparing groups, significant differences, means
query_categories.relationship: PASS - 3 queries about correlations, relationships, regression

enhanced_ai_copilot.data_context_info: PASS - Shows Form ID, Variables count, Numeric count, Categorical count
enhanced_ai_copilot.conversation_history: PASS - Maintained in component state, Clear button available when history exists

testing_notes.org_switch_required: Must switch from TEST_QualityAI_Org to Test Organization to see forms
testing_notes.form_selection: MobilePayment form has test data with 50 responses
testing_notes.ai_copilot_backend: Uses /api/ai-copilot/analyze endpoint with EMERGENT_LLM_KEY for AI analysis
